pr_title: Get larger batch of input files when using native batch with google cloud

timeline.message:
Get larger batch of input files when using native batch with google cloud

By default native batch ingestion was only getting a batch of 10
files at a time when used with google cloud. The Default for other
cloud providers is 1024, and should be similar for google cloud.
The low batch size was caused by mistype. This change updates the
batch size to 1024 when using google cloud.

timeline.bodyText: nit: this should probably just use GoogleCloudStorageInputSource.MAX_LISTING_LENGTH directly in the event it ever changes
timeline.author: clintropolis
